ComicInfo.Summary:
The Moderator Part One: As the Moderator hunts for the TARDIS on a mission from Dogbolter, the Doctor and Gus find themselves pursued as curfew-breakers by the Gaunts. Just before they are captured, they fall through the ground into a tunnel.
4-Dimensional Vistas Part VI: The Doctor explains Autek's plan to create a crystal now to be harvest in the future in order to power a highly-destructive sonic cannon. The Doctor then tracks down their foes in the TARDIS and destroys the Meddler's TARDIS by materializing in the same location a millisecond before it can. The Time Meddler and his TARDIS are projected into another dimension and the Ice Warriors' ship is destroyed. After the Doctor leaves to return Gus to his home, one of the SAG 3 troops reveals that his clairvoyance has predicted Gus's death.
4-Dimensional Vistas Part V: SAG 3, the military unit, invades the Ice Warriors' base. Autek orders the Time-Meddler to take off, decimating his own Ice Warriors. SAG 3 rescue the Doctor, while his foes have traveled five million years into the future to raise the crucible.
ComicInfo.Title: The Moderator Part One; 4-Dimensional Vistas Part VI; 4-Dimensional Vistas Part V
